TopicTitle: Europa Universalis IV - my empire as it stands in November 1478

Articles.Content:
Hello people,

Along side KSP and my many other games, i like to indulge in a little of this new game i found, called Europa Universallis IV.

here is my empire as it stands, after another bloody war with the french. (I'm England btw)
How the heck did you manage to win against France???

Nicely done!

Been a rather big fan of the series all the way back to the first game, myself. Just recently picked up the fourth one and started playing it.
